name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Bread provided by a canteen in a middle school in Inner Mongolia

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
In a music video of "Love in the Rain" on Bilibili, actress Zhao Wei's face was mosaiced.
Some netizens said that if it is not mosaiced, it cannot be posted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I then searched for related terms on Bilibili and found that except for a few videos with Zhao Wei’s scenes, most videos about “Love in the Rain” more or less blurred or erased the character played by Zhao Wei, including the full narration of the entire series that lasted two and a half hours.
According to comments from netizens, the relevant content was removed or cleared from August 2022.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: When searching directly for "Zhao Wei", only the news about Zhao Wei being removed from the internet was found. Meanwhile, in searches related to "My Fair Princess", there were also videos with the actress mosaiced.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 30, a fire broke out on the pier of Chongqing Huanghuayuan Bridge, and thick smoke billowed from the scene.
It is reported that the open fire has been extinguished, and the cause of the fire and the type of combustibles are still under investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! 
Around 10pm on April 30, a stabbing incident occurred in Liuzhou City, Guangxi Province. The cause is currently unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The campus network of a certain university in Hefei has begun to restrict wireless connection to foreign addresses today.
A student logged into Steam to play a game, which caused the gateway to be blocked. After asking the teacher, the teacher said that he needed to plug in an Internet cable to play foreign games.
